name: GoK
detailed_description:
Game of kingdoms [/ b] [/ i] - is adventures of warriors of the three kingdoms on the forgotten territory.

PLOT
  -A being unknown Rognar before, penetrated into his dream. Rognar made his mind to go campaign having taken five ships with brave warriors with him. As a result, the being led Rognar to new lands. Having landed on the bank and explored it Rognar's people chanced upon an ancient altar. When Ragnar came up to it, the statue started talking to him in a voice of the being from his dreams. He decided to gather a squad and go exploring, having ordered his men to start building the camp.

Game process for 0.1v.
- A warrior of 1 of the 3 kingdoms is available.
- The first populated location of the open world of secret lands.
- One of the four dungeons.
- Introductory quests of the plot line.
- Character pumping system with skills.
- AI that independently makes decisions on movement.
- The first test arena

Plans for the nearest future.
- To open access to the GOK multiplayer.
- To vary the open world with new locations and opponents.
- To create and introduce more difficult AI system that will react to happening events in the world.

ATTENTION!
At the moment the game is in 0.1v. . The systems presented in the game are in development and can be cardinally changed at any moment.

short_description: Game of kingdoms [/ b] [/ i] - welcome to new world Game of Kingdoms! Plunge into exciting adventures in action genre with the wide function of RPG and open world. Become support for your people and learn the secrets of this world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • 处理器: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • 内存: 4 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD
  • 存储空间: 需要 5 GB 可用空间
  • 声卡: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • 处理器: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • 内存: 6 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X)
  • 存储空间: 需要 5 GB 可用空间
  • 声卡: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
